Title: The Ricks Must Be Crazy
Writer: Justin Roiland (created by), Dan Harmon (created by), Dan Guterman, Mike McMahan (story editor), David Phillips (story editor), Matt Roller (story editor), Brian Wysol (story editor), Eric Acosta (staff writer), Tom Kauffman (staff writer), Wade Randolph (staff writer)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: Rick is having trouble with his car and they have to fix it by traveling to the microverse.
